articles.title: Report: Patriots QBs coach Ashton Grant to stay in New England, won’t take OC interviews
articles.description:
Grant, a former wide receiver at Assumption University, played a major role in Drake Maye’s second-year jump.

The post Report: Patriots QBs coach Ashton Grant to stay in New England, won’t take OC interviews appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Patriots QBs coach Ashton Grant will remain in New England, declining OC interviews.
Grant previously contributed to Drake Maye's development at Assumption University.
His decision supports stability for the Patriots' quarterback development in 2023.

articles.title: Brighton community raises $25k for flooded barbershop
articles.description:
After a burst pipe devastated Matt's Barber Shop, one customer launched a GoFundMe to help the business.

The post Brighton community raises $25k for flooded barbershop appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Brighton community raised $25,000 for Matt's Barber Shop after a burst pipe.
Customer launched a GoFundMe campaign to support the flooded business.
Funds will help restore a local business vital to the community.
